description: CD Genomics has been providing the accurate and affordable RNA-Seq (RNA sequencing) service for decades. We combine both Illumina (short reads) and PacBio (long reads) platforms to obtain the transcriptome that allows de novo assembly or re-sequencing for bacteria, plants, animals and humans. CD Genomics provides full RNA sequencing service package including sample standardization, library construction, deep sequencing, raw data quality control, genome assembly, and customized bioinformatics analysis. We can tailor this pipeline to your research interest. If you have additional requirements or questions, please feel free to contact us.
name: RNA sequencing
